text: Ivan Brovkin on the State Farm () is a 1958 Soviet comedy movie directed by Ivan Lukinsky.Иван Бровкин на целинеКино не для всех: есть ли будущее у оренбургских фильмов? It stars Leonid Kharitonov, Sergei Blinnikov, and Tatyana Pelttser. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1958 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies set in Russia Category:Movies set on farms Category:Movies directed by Ivan Lukinsky
title: Ivan Brovkin on the State Farm
